reviews.sentence: Usual place to stay when on business trip in Bratislava. Quite okay hotel in a perfect location. Offers standard business accommodation above average breakfast and fitness swimming pool facilities that I unfortunately did not have chance to try. Rooms might definitely use some refurbishing. can not judge value for money as I have no comparison in Bratislava.

Great Location by the Old Town Friendly Staff Good Service. Hotel Needs Updating. The hotel has a great location on one of the main streets on the River. There were a couple of tour groups staying there during our visitThe carpets in the hotel are old stained and worn but clean throughout the halls and in the rooms. My room was larger than normal Eastern European hotels. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Towels are sufficient but a little thin. There were 3 or 4 holes in my curtains. There was a little mold in one spot of the bathromReceptionists were friendly and speak multiple languages fluently. I arrived to the hotel in the last evening and chose to eat there. I ate at Le Square and had soup club sandwich and fries. The people next to me were having fish and pork. My meal was excellent. The people next to me said theirs was also very good. It looked and smelled delicious. The staff in the restaurant was professional attentive and very friendly. I would eat there again. My breakfast was included. It was a breakfast buffet with an assortment of hot food eggs potatoes several meats etc cereals salads cold meats cheeses breads vegetables coffee teas juices etc. While the choices seemed a little limited I thought the food was tastyThe Main Stret River side of the hotel is a bit noisy. I recommend a room on the opposite side for a quieter room. I had a great price on this hotel. I think it was a good value for me when I consider the service and the price.

OK hotel brilliantly situated. This hotel is clean and relatively comfortable but lacks a soul. In my 48hrs there I do not think I saw one member of staff smileThe rooms are well equipped but come with huge pillows great when propped up watching TV but when you lay down and rest your head on them to sleep your feet hang off the end of the bed as the pillow takes up at a quarter of the length and I am only of average height I pity tall people trying to sleep here. Breakfast was very very average and did with zero variety in the the two days I stayed. You can not fault the location though on the banks of The Danube and close to centre. Overall just another large hotel without any spirit attention to detail or soul.

NOT 4 QUALITY. GOOD POINTS. BreakfastThe modern bathromPol gym and hot tubThe bed was big and comfortableThe locationBAD POINTS. The bedroom was outdated and grotty. It had old furniture tacky wallpaper the carpet was horrific and probably older than I am curtains were bad generally not clean dusty and fridge smelt. The air conditioning did not workNo WIFI in bedroom. Or even the capacity to pay for wifi. There is absolutely no way this hotel would pass for anything more than 2 in the UK. The rooms are below the standard found in budget hotels eg. Premier Inn or Travelodge but the same price per night. If it was in the UK I would have got a full refund and left but after 2 weeks of travelling we could not be bothered to complain as we intended on being outside most of the day. Avoid. Better options elsewhere.

Great Value hotel. The hotel has a great locatioin. Nestled between the happening downtown and the Danube. The breakfast was wholesome and good. The best part was the price point at which the rooms were on offer. Some of the negative points are that the carpets were threadbare stained and neither the wifi nor the room safe worked. This was true for nearly all six rooms which we occupied. I guess if they just improve this and provide tea coffee maker in the room they would be able to attract a much higher price for the rooms. Any way overall it turned out to be a good deal.
Filthy. Filthy and old rooms without no wifi. Breakfast ok and close proximity to the old town. Will not stay here again.

Nice hotel but basic rooms. Stayed here for business purposes and from the photo of the room in the elevator I was expecting a quite luxury room. Unfortunately they looked bit outdated but they were good though. I would suggest to the management to simple repaint the doors and put a more design like mirror and paintings in the tom which will upgrade them to a four star rated room. I enjoyed the view from my window on the castle. Price is good.

Average. I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights but it was not very much good. Was upgraded to business room but the rooms was very small. The hotel location is very good. The breakfast was very limited and pity. The hotel need more to improve and need renovation.

outside good looking inside terrible. I was shocked by this hotel since arrival. reception very low mannered rooms dirty minibar included drinks with date after use. when i notified manager he came to apologize but the responsible room service attendant said not my fault which is a bit shocking. so was it my fault. did i swop the drinks in a fridge. a joke. i have worked in past. in 5 hotel in hospitality environment and if i would have said this to the guest i d be fired same day. unsurprisingly this behavior is somehow becoming common within hospitality workers in Bratislava and it is a shame as the city is beautiful and attracts lot of tourists and businesses. but i have not found anything pleasant during my visit in danube hotel. the service is 2.

Really friendly staff great location in the central London. The room I stayed in looked old and small. I slept something like 2 hours in the night because of the noise not sure what it was but like flowing water in tubes or some kind of central air con the air con in my room was switched off. I had a view of a concrete wall which was sold to me as a court view. I have to say that I was glad to be staying only a night.

Bad experience. We stayed for only 1 night. First of all when we arrived in the hotel we stored my friends medicine in the refrigerator. Then we left and spent the whole day out and came back in the hotel late at night. We checked the refrigerator and it was warm inside and the medicine which is very expensive and vital for my friends health was damaged. So disappointing. When we said it to the reception they told us they are sorry and that they will fix the problem for the next costumers but its does nt really matter to us. Apart from this the room was clean but very small and generally the whole decor of the hotel is kind of melancholic for me. Maybe is the colors black white and Grey that make it look like this. But the place where breakfast was served was really beautiful with great atmosphere and the waiter the big guy was very kind and helpful. However the quality of the breakfast its self was not that good and everything was exposed without a cover to protect them. There are clear caps for protection that should be use. Also I prefer the products to be packaged so I know the brand name of it the energy etc and the expiration date not for example just yogurt in a boul. How can I know the quality of the yogurt if I do nt know where you got it from. It happens with every single product in the breakfast and I did nt like it at all. Finally the Orange Juice was not like Orange Juice but it tasted more like Water with Orange Juice. Anyway it was just a bad experience from all aspects. The worst is that our medicine was damaged. We wo nt come back in this hotel in the future.

great location. great view close to public transport and close to picturesque city centerOnly spent two nights there but very good service and very helpful forgot something in the room after checking out and the pick up afterwards worked out excellently.

One night stand. The room is clean and nice the remote did not work properly. The parking is was too expensive. The berakfast is great. The staff is very friendly and nice. I did not like the noise. Party going everywhere and the sound isolation is not good.

No air condition. As earlier reviews suggest the hotel does not have real air conditioning only some type of ventilation system. I spoke to the reception but they could nt do anything about it. Pillows were the largest pillows i ’ve had ever seen and very uncomfortable but luckily we recieved other ones from the reception when asking. Otherwise good location polite staff and nice rooms but the warmth in the rooms ruins a good nights sleep therefore only 25.

Loved everything. It was an amazing accommodation and will surely recommend it to everyone that we l visit Slovakiathanx for the great memories. loved the breakfast also the total decoration of the hotel rooms bar and restaurant was modern and perfect.

Excellent hotel. Excellent location near from old town. The accommodation was pretty new modern and very clean. The bathroom has separate bathtub and shower which is a plus. Our bedroom also had a small kitchen and a living room.

Central location clean and pleasant stay. The hotel was very centrally located and was clean. We had a nice view on the river and the bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was good with a good variety. Only complaint I would have was that we were over charged for the mini bar. Which I do not understand as we filled the sheet out when we purchased 1 bottle of water but was put down as 2 on our bill.
Very good place to stay. Nice view out off The window.

Good hotel in prime location. We have stayed for 3 nights in Superior room. I have ordered the superior room as the entrance to the Spa is free to for the Superior guests. The river view was great and the room was comfortable. However to get to the room you have to go about 5 minutes from the elevator as the room is on the opposite side quite annoying each time. Another annoying thing was that a Spa Hotel could not supply Bathrobes to the guests. There were no Bathrobes in the room and not with the cleaner. Buffet breakfast was good but you should ask for everything no waiter to come and ask you if you wand a coffee tea or anything elselocation is the best as you can walk to every destination in the city within 10 15 minutes.
